TopicTitle: How do I delete things from the sub-asselbly saver/loader ?

Articles.Content: My little sister discovered how it works and started saving stuff on it. Now I can't use it because the "lifters" tab is full of things. Is there a hidden "delete" button somewhere?
Inside your KSP folder, you'll find them in PluginData\subassemblyLoader\subassemblies - go in there and delete the stuff you don't want from the lifters folder or wherever it may have ended up.
